price: They fulfill their vows and fear a Day whose evil will spread far and wide,
arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
